actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that law enforcement service performed while in the Coast Guard shall be included in determining whether an individual qualifies for immediate retirement as a law enforcement officer or firefighter under section 8336(c) of such title.

summary.text: Stipulates that law enforcement service performed while in the Coast Guard shall be included in determining whether an individual qualifies for immediate retirement as a law enforcement officer or firefighter. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336(c)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that law enforcement service performed while in the Coast Guard shall be included in determining whether an individual qualifies for immediate retirement as a law enforcement officer or firefighter under section 8336(c) of such title.
